channel.title: I am super duper mad!
channel.description: Well this morning it snowed like fuck and then it turned into ice and now it's rain and guess fucking what. we have a 2 hour gay delay instead of no school

item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“iKapa, post:13, topic:318518”][quote author=xxlukexx link=topic=414986.msg3054768#msg3054768 date=1260378989]

FUCK NIGGER UK WITH ITS LACK OF SNOW :mad: :mad: :mad:

Lol they said it won’t snow in UK this year till atleast feb. They had better be wrong.

lol? they have been on going about white christmas this year.
[/quote]

Not where I’m living.

Idc anyway they said we wouldn’t get any snow till like march or something like year and it snowed in jan.[/quote]

im in the uk if your wondering.

item.title: I am super duper mad!
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote="`Alec, post:1, topic:318541"][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=414986.msg3054663#msg3054663 date=1260370716]
Just don’t show up to school. I got last week and this week off school because I feel like it
[/quote]
Okay well some people care about their education. There are kids with aids who go to school just for an education, and you just ‘don’t show up’ to school?!?!?![/quote]
Because I aced my exams and passed with flying colours. [size=1px]They said I didn’t need to[/size]
